title: The Raptors Win the Most Boring Double-OT Playoff Game in Recent Memory | Heat Check
description:
Kawhi Leonard and the Toronto Raptors take advantage of an off-night from Giannis Antetokounmpo to edge out a double-OT win against the Milwaukee Bucks in Game 3 (3:12), while the Portland Trail Blazers fall behind 3-0 to the still-dominant Golden State Warriors (28:10). Plus: The Duffel Bag Boys weigh in on the NBA draft lottery order (38:34).

Host: John Gonzalez
Guests: Mark Titus, Tate Frazier

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
